feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
